question: Hi I'm a bigger girl about 230 pounds I'm currently 22 weeks pregnant and I have pcos. I was taking metformin before I got pregnant and it was controlling my pcos. Now that I'm pregnant I'm worried about gestational diabetes... I've never had high blood sugar and when I was diagnosed with pcos I had to do the 3 hour glucose test and it came back fine.  Any suggestions/ thoughts etc ladies??
title: gestational diabetes
